name: tumblr - Clean Slate Icons
description: NOTE: As of 01.01.2013 this style will no longer be supported. tumblr tool for easy icon bar modification Tested W7/FF and Chrome Screenshots display icon bars created using this style. Create your icons, replace one section of code, and publish! Tutorials available at: ohnemitleid.tumblr.com
additional_info:
This style may appear to overwrite any current specialty icon bar you have installed. If this is not desired, simply disable this style.

If no specialty icon bar is installed, you may notice a slight shifting of the icons while enabling; this is normal.

Using this style is easy! Simply create your new icons, store your new creation on the internet, replace one section of code with your new URL, and proudly publish your creation on userstyles.org!

03-14-2012 - Updated to adjust for changes to tumblr icon bar.
